an5.250:1.3: Yasmiṁ, bhikkhave, puggale puggalo abhippasanno hoti, so tathārūpaṁ āpattiṁ āpanno hoti yathārūpāya āpattiyā saṅgho ukkhipati.
an5.250:1.5: ‘yo kho myāyaṁ puggalo piyo manāpo so saṅghena ukkhitto’ti.
an5.250:1.7: Bhikkhūsu appasādabahulo samāno aññe bhikkhū na bhajati.
an5.250:1.8: Aññe bhikkhū abhajanto saddhammaṁ na suṇāti.
an5.250:2.1: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, yasmiṁ puggale puggalo abhippasanno hoti, so tathārūpaṁ āpattiṁ āpanno hoti yathārūpāya āpattiyā saṅgho ante nisīdāpeti.
an5.250:2.3: ‘yo kho myāyaṁ puggalo piyo manāpo so saṅghena ante nisīdāpito’ti.
an5.250:2.5: Bhikkhūsu appasādabahulo samāno aññe bhikkhū na bhajati.
an5.250:2.6: Aññe bhikkhū abhajanto saddhammaṁ na suṇāti.
an5.250:3.1: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, yasmiṁ puggale puggalo abhippasanno hoti, so disāpakkanto hoti …pe… so vibbhanto hoti …pe… so kālaṅkato hoti.
an5.250:3.3: ‘yo kho myāyaṁ puggalo piyo manāpo so kālaṅkato’ti.
an5.250:3.5: Aññe bhikkhū abhajanto saddhammaṁ na suṇāti.
an5.250:3.8: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā puggalappasāde”ti.
